stories.Title: Monitoring hurricanes is now easier
stories.Description: After the loss of the first TROPICS satellites, Rocket Lab and NASA have launched a new pair of CubeSats to track tropical storms
stories.Tweet: Monitoring hurricanes is now easier 📦 After the loss of the first TROPICS satellites, Rocket Lab and NASA have launched a new pair of CubeSats to track tropical storms #NASA https://spacenews.com/rocket-lab-launches-nasa-tropics-cubesats/

stories.Title: Microsoft joins forces with AMD
stories.Description: In an effort to reduce its reliance on Nvidia, the company is collaborating with AMD to enhance the AI capabilities of its GPUs.
stories.Tweet: Microsoft joins forces with AMD 📦 In an effort to reduce its reliance on Nvidia, the company is collaborating with AMD to enhance the AI capabilities of its GPUs. #microsoft https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2023/05/microsoft-and-amd-are-allegedly-teaming-up-to-combat-nvidias-ai-dominance/

stories.Title: Apple remains silent about AI
stories.Description: The company's approach to AI remains a mystery as they have shown little interest in making significant moves in the field, despite constant speculation.
stories.Tweet: Apple remains silent about AI 📦 The company's approach to AI remains a mystery as they have shown little interest in making significant moves in the field, despite constant speculation. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/05/08/apple-ai-plans/

stories.Title: Tesla gets AI update
stories.Description: Despite his initial reservations, Elon Musk has confirmed that the upcoming v12 update for Tesla's Full Self-Driving package will soon be equipped with end-to-end AI.
stories.Tweet: Tesla gets AI update 📦 Despite his initial reservations, Elon Musk has confirmed that the upcoming v12 update for Tesla's Full Self-Driving package will soon be equipped with end-to-end AI. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/05/08/tesla-changes-course-full-self-driving-end-to-end-ai-v12-musk/

stories.Title: Tesla's new building in Texas
stories.Description: As a sign of its commitment to improving the safety of its electric vehicles, Tesla has announced it will build a new crash test lab in Austin.
stories.Tweet: Tesla's new building in Texas 📦 As a sign of its commitment to improving the safety of its electric vehicles, Tesla has announced it will build a new crash test lab in Austin. #tesla https://electrek.co/2023/05/08/tesla-crash-test-lab-austin/

stories.Title: All about RasaGPT
stories.Description: Meet the first headless LLM chatbot platform built on top of Rasa and Langchain which offers indexing, retrieval, and context injection capabilities.
stories.Tweet: All about RasaGPT 📦 Meet the first headless LLM chatbot platform built on top of Rasa and Langchain which offers indexing, retrieval, and context injection capabilities. #programming https://github.com/paulpierre/RasaGPT

stories.Title: Screenwriters fear being replaced by AI
stories.Description: In the midst of the Writers Guild of America strike, writers continue to express concern that AI may threaten the future of screenplays.
stories.Tweet: Screenwriters fear being replaced by AI 📦 In the midst of the Writers Guild of America strike, writers continue to express concern that AI may threaten the future of screenplays. #ai https://apnews.com/article/ai-hollywood-writers-strike-artificial-intelligence-dc71c4cabcca0ee1b1afe0050d392a36

stories.Title: Bard just landed on Workspace
stories.Description: Workspace accounts now have access to Google's AI tool. While user access still requires admin approval, AI-powered assistance is just one click away.
stories.Tweet: Bard just landed on Workspace 📦 Workspace accounts now have access to Google's AI tool. While user access still requires admin approval, AI-powered assistance is just one click away. #google https://9to5google.com/2023/05/05/google-bard-workspace-accounts-support/

stories.Title: Generative AI is improving antibody therapies
stories.Description: A recent study published in Nature Biotechnology shows promising results in using AI to improve the potency of antibodies against viruses like SARS-CoV-2 and ebolavirus.
stories.Tweet: Generative AI is improving antibody therapies 📦 A recent study published in Nature Biotechnology shows promising results in using AI to improve the potency of antibodies against viruses like SARS-CoV-2 and ebolavirus. #ai https://www.nature.com/articles/d41586-023-01516-w

stories.Title: Chemix is revolutionizing the EV battery market
stories.Description: The San Francisco-based startup is using AI to speed up EV battery development through their Mix software, which suggests new molecules for daily testing based on data.
stories.Tweet: Chemix is revolutionizing the EV battery market 📦 The San Francisco-based startup is using AI to speed up EV battery development through their Mix software, which suggests new molecules for daily testing based on data. #startups https://www.fastcompany.com/90892687/this-startup-uses-ai-to-design-better-ev-batteries

stories.Title: Bad news for your inbox
stories.Description: Google's latest move to embed ads in the middle of Gmail inboxes is causing concern for users, who fear it will make them more susceptible to clicking on deceptive content.
stories.Tweet: Bad news for your inbox 📦 Google's latest move to embed ads in the middle of Gmail inboxes is causing concern for users, who fear it will make them more susceptible to clicking on deceptive content. #gmail https://www.techradar.com/news/your-gmail-account-is-set-to-be-invaded-by-even-more-annoying-ads
